ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Yes. I would. This gives you a basic idea of doing field work in the newest fields. This is different from all other anthropology courses.
Interesting topic on a very relevant topic, which often is not addressed in coursework. A great opportunity to engage new, cutting edge topics that touch all our lives. Definitely take it.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: I am not doing anthropological research. This is not applicable.

This broadened my exposure to different aspects of anthropology and studying digital worlds which will greatly help my future dissertation research. I look forward to being able to apply these concepts in my own field which often lacks them.
